word_mean: 〔Ernest Orlando Lawrence，美国物理学家，1901～1958，用以产生高能粒子的第一个回旋加速器的建造者，于1939年获诺贝尔物理学奖〕铹：原子序数为103，原子量为257，化学符号为Lw的化学元素
于1961年由轰击质量为250，251和252的化学元素锎的同位素而得到

sentence.Network_en: Any of a series of chemically similar, radioactive elements with atomic numbers ranging from 89 ( actinium ) through 103 ( lawrencium ).
sentence.Network_cn: 锕类任何化学性质相似, 原子序数在89 ( 锕 ) 与103 ( 铹 ) 之间变化的放射性元素.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1960s: modern Latin, named after E. O. Lawrence (see Lawrence), who founded the laboratory in which it was produced

means.word_mean: 1. a radioactive transuranic element synthesized from californium
